content: I could have done without the hyperbolic conclusion that a man who uses ghostwriters to publish books at a fifth-grade reading level is a “better storyteller” than Hemingway. There are very interesting points made here. A less Buzzfeed-y way to put it might have been something along the lines of, “Ernest Hemingway and the Art of the Slogan,” or, “What Do the Trump Campaign and Ernest Hemingway Have in Common?” or “Hemingway, Trump, and How to Make a Movement Without Really Trying.” I dunno. Anything but this title!
